translations: n.[计]门闩线路；插销（latch 的复数形式）
v.用插销插上；缠住；理解（latch 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: She always latches on to the latest craze.
sentences.translation: 她总是对最新时尚有浓厚的兴趣。

sentences.sentence: It latches on to new ideas.
The drug latches onto calcium and gets deposited in bone.
sentences.translation: 四环素类药物会与钙螯合，沉积在骨骼中。
